root.mailSubject: Customer Admin USER Approved with Id - <%userId%> is created
root.mailContent:
Dear <%firstName%><%lastName%>,

We are excited to have you onboard as Customer Admin as ID:<%userId%>. Please use this Id for any further communiation



Please find attached document, mapping out the steps of your onboarding. As a first step, please follow the document instructions to customize your account and to onboard Customers.
Also, here are some resources you might find useful:. Kindly note that the attachments are password protected. To open the attachment, kindly enter your 6 / 8 digit Customer ID. This e-mail is for your information and does not require a response.



If you wish to contact us for any further clarifications, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.



Sincerely,
Bank Admin Department
www.OA-ADMIN.com
